TEXT: The first applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national , who was born in DATE .
The second applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national , who was born in DATE .
The third applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national , who was born in DATE .
The fourth applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national , who was born in DATE .
All the applicants reside in the village of GPE , GPE , GPE .
They were represented before the ORG by PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE , GPE .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
All the applicants are retired military servicemen . In DATE , they retired from ORG and were entitled to certain financial assistance . However , this aid was only partially paid .
The first applicant was entitled to CARDINAL,CARDINAL UAH , but received only CARDINAL,CARDINAL UAH , CARDINAL,CARDINAL UAH remaining unpaid .
The second applicant was entitled to CARDINAL,CARDINAL UAH , but received only CARDINAL,CARDINAL UAH , CARDINAL,CARDINAL UAH remaining unpaid .
The third applicant was entitled to CARDINAL,CARDINAL UAH , but received only CARDINAL,CARDINAL UAH , CARDINAL,CARDINAL UAH remaining unpaid .
The fourth applicant was entitled to CARDINAL,CARDINAL UAH , but received only CARDINAL,CARDINAL UAH , CARDINAL,CARDINAL UAH remaining unpaid .
The applicants each instituted separate proceedings in ORG against ORG A-CARDINAL , seeking recovery of the unpaid part of their allowances .
The first applicant

On DATE ORG ( ORG местного суда ORG гарнизона ) found in favour of the first applicant and awarded him CARDINAL ORG , including CARDINAL ORG for unpaid allowances and the delay in payment , as well as CARDINAL ORG in court costs . On DATE , the Military Appellate Court of the Southern Region ( ORG апелляционного суда Южного региона ) upheld the decision of the first instance court .
On DATE , the applicant submitted the execution writ to the ORG of LOC ( Отдел Государственной исполнительной службы ORG районного управления юстиции PERSON области ) .

On DATE , the same first instance court found for the applicant in another set of proceedings against the same defendant and awarded him CARDINAL ORG , including CARDINAL ORG for unpaid allowances and CARDINAL UAH in court costs . On DATE , the Military Appellate Court of GPE upheld the decision of the first instance court .
On DATE , the applicant submitted the execution writ to the ORG of LOC .
On DATE , both judgments in the applicant ’s favour were fully enforced and the applicant was paid CARDINAL UAH .
The second applicant

On DATE the ORG found in favour of the second applicant and awarded him CARDINAL ORG , including CARDINAL.CARDINAL UAH for unpaid allowances and the delay in payment , as well as CARDINAL ORG in court costs . On DATE , the Military Appellate Court of the Southern Region upheld the decision of the first instance court .
In DATE the applicant submitted the execution writ to the ORG of LOC .
On DATE , the judgment in the applicant ’s favour was fully enforced and the applicant was paid CARDINAL ORG .
The third applicant

On DATE the ORG found in favour of the third applicant and awarded him CARDINAL ORG , including CARDINAL.CARDINAL ORG for unpaid allowances and the delay in payment , as well as CARDINAL ORG in court costs . On DATE , the Military Appellate Court of the Southern Region upheld the decision of the first instance court .
On DATE , the applicant submitted the execution writ to the ORG of LOC .

On DATE , the same first instance court found for the applicant in another set of proceedings against the same defendant and awarded him CARDINAL ORG , including CARDINAL UAH for unpaid allowances and QUANTITY in court costs . On DATE , the Military Appellate Court of GPE upheld the decision of the first instance court .
On DATE , the applicant submitted the execution writ to the ORG of LOC .
On DATE , both judgments in the applicant ’s favour were fully enforced and the applicant was paid CARDINAL ORG .
The fourth applicant

On DATE ORG ( ORG местного суда ORG гарнизона ) gave decisions in favour of the fourth applicant and awarded him CARDINAL UAH for unpaid allowances and the delay in payment . On DATE , the Military Appellate Court of the Southern Region upheld the decision of the first instance court .
On DATE , the applicant submitted the execution writ to the ORG of LOC .

On DATE , the same first instance court found for the applicant in another set of proceedings against the same defendant and awarded him CARDINAL UAH , including CARDINAL ORG for unpaid allowances and CARDINAL ORG in court costs . On DATE , ORG upheld the decision of the first instance court .
On DATE , the applicant submitted the execution writ to the ORG of LOC .
On DATE , both judgments in the applicant ’s favour were fully enforced and the applicant was paid CARDINAL UAH .
CARDINAL . Civil Code of GPE

Under LAW , in case of delay in the fulfilment of its financial obligations , the debtor must , upon a claim by the creditor , pay the amount of the debt , plus any interest payable at an established inflation rate during the default period .
CARDINAL . PERSON of GPE of DATE “ on Enforcement Proceedings ”

Under LAW , the enforcement of judgments is entrusted to ORG . Under LAW , the creditor may file a complaint against actions or omissions of ORG with the head of the competent department of that ORG or with a local court . Article CARDINAL of the PERSON entitles the creditor to institute court proceedings against a legal person , entrusted with enforcement of a judgment , for inadequate enforcement or non - enforcement of a judgement , and to receive compensation .
CARDINAL . PERSON of GPE of DATE “ on ORG ”

LAW provides for the liability of bailiffs for any inadequate performance of their duties , and compensation for damages caused by a bailiff when enforcing a judgment . Under LAW , acts and omissions of the bailiff can be challenged before a superior official or the courts .
